name: Roll or Die (James, cutelyn, SummerChu, Agecaf, CupcakeCrazier, sennoide)
name_original: Roll or Die (James, cutelyn, SummerChu, Agecaf, CupcakeCrazier, sennoide)
description:
Roll or Die is a lite infinite-battle dice assignment RPG made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam theme "Roll Of The Dice." Fight endless enemies, assigning randomly-rolled dice from a pool to power each of your three heroes' abilities. Keep your heroes alive, use your dice wisely, and defeat as many monsters as you can!

How To Play:
Each round, give a die to each of your heroes, dropping it on their ability and choosing a target.
Click the text below each hero for info about their ability.
Once each hero has had their turn, the monsters attack their targeted heroes.
Try to defeat as many monsters as you can!

The Team:
Agecaf, Cutelyn, Fizzy, Gabriela Peroni, James Weimer, Justin, marcherin, Sennóide, & SummerChu
